definition: Xia county in Yuncheng 運城|运城[Yun4 cheng2], Shanxi
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
Linxia county city in Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Zhi Zhi is 8 years old , and her home is in a common country of Linxia Town in Gansu Province.
